data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lackner, Tomáš (2013): Revision of the genus Ctenophilothis Kryzhanovskij, 1987 (Coleoptera: Histeridae: Saprininae). Zootaxa 3691 (2): 273-282, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3691.2.6
